title: 5.4 Master Challenge 3
question: You have a laptop with limited storage space. You need to free up some space to install a new program. What steps would you take to identify and delete unnecessary files and programs? What tools or software would you use to optimize the storage space on your laptop?
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
